article.title: Liouville Action as Path-Integral Complexity: From Continuous Tensor Networks to AdS/CFT

multiple_choice_question.text: Which geometry describes the optimized path-integral computation of a ground state wave function in a 2D CFT?
What is the term used to describe a sequence of simple unitary operations used to construct a quantum state from a reference state?
What type of tensor network provides an optimal representation of the Euclidean path-integral for a ground state wave functional in a CFT?
During the Tensor Network Renormalization (TNR) procedure, what types of tensors accumulate from the UV boundary?
What does the shift of φ at a specific layer represent in the context of tensor network renormalization?
choices: One step contribution towards the final MERA network
Increase in the number of tensors in the network

multiple_choice_question.text: What geometric structure emerges as the holographic dual after optimizing the path-integral representation of a reduced density matrix in a 2D CFT?
choices: Two copies of the entanglement wedge
Time slice of the black hole

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the role of the conical deficit angle in the computation of entanglement entropy using the optimized reduced density matrix?
choices: It represents the back-reaction of local operator insertion.
It reflects the presence of a primary state excitation.
It is a consequence of the replica method and corresponds to infinitesimally small negative deficit angle deformation.
It signifies the difference between optimized and unoptimized metrics.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which part of the path-integral contour for TFD states is optimized by minimizing the Liouville action?
In the tensor network description of TFD states, what characterizes the confinement/deconfinement phase transition?
choices: Change in the type of tensors used in the network
Disappearance of the microscopic bridge at low temperature
Macroscopic form of the tensor network changing from disconnected to connected
Transition from a tree tensor network to a MERA network

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the minimization of the functional IΨ[gab(z, x)] with respect to the metric gab represent in the context of path-integral optimization?
choices: Obtaining the ground state wave functional
Finding the optimal tensor network description
Achieving maximum optimization of the path-integral

multiple_choice_question.text: In 2D CFTs, what quantity is proposed as the complexity functional IΨ0 for the vacuum state?
In Formula (8.2) Quiz:, What does the proposed complexity functional I[φ] for higher dimensional CFTs resemble?
choices: A generalization of the Liouville action to higher dimensions
